title: Which depicts relation bt performance and arousal

content.question: Which of the following best depicts the relation between performance and arousal?

choices.label: The figure shows an inverted u-shaped curve with multiple data points. The curve starts at approximately 4 comma zero point two five, reaches its peak at approximately 8 comma 6 point 5, and ends at approximately 12 comma zero point two five.

The figure shows a u-shaped curve with multiple data points. The curve starts at approximately 4 point 5 comma 4, reaches its lowest point at approximately 8 comma zero point two five, and ends at approximately 12 comma 6 point 5.
The figure shows a straight line with multiple data points. The line starts at approximately one comma zero, and ends at approximately 15 comma 9.
The figure shows a straight line with multiple data points. The line starts at approximately one comma 9, and ends at approximately 15 comma zero.

content.answer: The figure shows an inverted u-shaped curve with multiple data points. The curve starts at approximately 4 comma zero point two five, reaches its peak at approximately 8 comma 6 point 5, and ends at approximately 12 comma zero point two five.

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
